mapper.insert: insert into version_info (version_id, version_user_id, version_number, version_date, version_content) values (#{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select version_id, version_user_id, version_number, version_date, version_content from version_info
